TopicTitle: KSP RO stuck on same file each time it loads up

Articles.Content: Hi, I have recently installed realism overhaul for 1.12.3 on CKAN along with RO capsules, engines, and tanks, but when loading up the game, it gets stuck on a single file from RO engines. What do I do?

Can you post the game logs? Here’s how:

Which file is getting stuck?
unfortunately,  I can't find the game log file in my file explorer, but the file it is getting stuck on is ROEngines/Partconfigs/BTNR/ROE-BTNR

Go to wherever you've installed KSP, open the KSP root folder and you'll find a text file called KSP.txt or KSP.log, then follow the guide above to share it.

Try deleting the problematic part's config and see if it loads after that, or reinstall ROEngines.

Are you installing mods in the Steam copy of KSP by any chance?
